titleStmt.title: Divinity in mortality, or The Gospels excellency and the preachers frailty, represented in a sermon preached at the funerals of Mr Richard Goddard late minister of the parish of St Gregories by Pauls; who died on Thursday the 12th of May 1653. and was buried on Moonday [sic] the 16th day of the same moneth. By Nath. Hardy Master of Arts, and preacher to the parish of St Dyonis Back-Church.
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

titleStmt.title: Divinity in mortality, or The Gospels excellency and the preachers frailty, represented in a sermon preached at the funerals of Mr Richard Goddard late minister of the parish of St Gregories by Pauls; who died on Thursday the 12th of May 1653. and was buried on Moonday [sic] the 16th day of the same moneth. By Nath. Hardy Master of Arts, and preacher to the parish of St Dyonis Back-Church.
titleStmt.author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Nathanael Webb and William Grantham, and are to be sold at the sign of the Black Bear in St Pauls Church-yard near the little north door.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
